name: Syntax for Fasta
description:
Syntax highlighting for the Fasta format (Pearson) for biosequences.
Also available at http://bioinf.ibun.unal.edu.co/~miguel/?id=5
install_details:
Just place file into syntax folder.  To tell vim detect fasta files automatically, just put the following line into filetype.vim (into the vim configuration dir):

au BufNewFile,BufRead *.fasta,*.fa  setf fasta
